title: Influence of methodological choices in farm sustainability assessments: A word of caution from a case study analysis of European dairy farms
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 156

Author(s): Lorraine Balaine, Cathal Buckley, Vincent Baillet, Xabier Díaz de Otálora, Federico Dragoni, Aurélie Wilfart, Barbara Amon, Agustín del Prado, Joanna Frątczak-Müller, Dominika Krol
